sentences.english: Rather than dealing with your mail yourself, you can outsource the task.
sentences.chinese: 處理郵件的事你可以申請外援，不必親自勞神。

sentences.english: They decided not to count on foreign aid to relieve the famine.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定不依靠外援來救災。

sentences.english: But such projects are few and far between.
sentences.chinese: 但是這樣的外援項目屈指可數。

sentences.english: Having no outside help also had its positive side, because we were forced to exert ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 沒有外援也有好處，迫使我們奮發努力。

definition: national security (abbr. for 國家安全|国家安全[guo2 jia1 an1 quan2])/national security act/state security agency
to transfer to another club (professional sports)
(sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
